metadata.title: CVE-2024-22365 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: linux-pam (aka Linux PAM) before 1.6.0 allows attackers to cause a denialof service (blocked login process) via mkfifo because the openat call (forprotect_dir) lacks O_DIRECTORY.

criterions.comment: pam: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
